meanings.definition: To draw more or better than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys outdrawing her friends in art class.
meanings.sent2: The talented artist is known for outdrawing all his competitors.
meanings.sent3: During the drawing competition, she couldn't resist outdrawing everyone with her creative sketches.
meanings.sent4: His passion for drawing is so strong that he seems to be outdrawing the very essence of art itself.
meanings.sent5: The image she created was so vivid, it felt like she was outdrawing reality itself.

meanings.sent1: He always manages to outdrawing his classmates with his detailed illustrations.
meanings.sent2: The young artist hopes to outdrawing his mentor one day.
meanings.sent3: In the art exhibition, his work seemed to be outdrawing even the most experienced artists.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for drawing is so strong that she is outdrawing all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The way he captures emotions in his drawings is truly outdrawing others in the field.
